title: Watch Jimmy Kimmel's 2017 Oscars Monologue

organizations.name: lagerfeld issues apology bill paxton dead
chicago movie theater patrons of chicago
la la land ’s dreamy los angeles mia
production company donated to trump without affleck knowing affleck/middleton project
hbo remy ma drops nicki minaj diss track

text:
Valiant champion of middle America Jimmy Kimmel targeted the issues that matter in his Oscars monologue this year, most importantly that Matt Damon is making some bad career choices . After bringing Damon down a peg with some ponytail jokes, Kimmel turned to Trump, whom he thanked for making Hollywood look much better by comparison — “Remember last year when it seemed like the Oscars were racist?” Then, because no Oscars presentation is complete without Meryl jokes, Kimmel took on the country’s most “overrated” nominee . The host led the audience in a “totally undeserved round of applause” and then got in a jab over her recent spat with Karl Lagerfeld . “Nice dress, by the way,” he joked. “Is that an Ivanka?” As Kimmel predicted, Donald Trump will likely respond on Twitter during his 5 a.m. bowel movement tomorrow.
